body:
The problem is that you have added the file holduino.ino to your sketch named sketch_jan18. The `setup` function is defined in both sketch_jan18.ino and holduino.ino, thus the error.

What you need to do is open the holduino sketch, rather than adding it to another sketch:

1. Download holduino: https://github.com/hoanghonn/holduino/archive/master.zip
2. Unzip the downloaded file. You can move the unzipped folder to any convenient location.
3. (In the Arduino IDE) File > Open
4. From the unzipped folder, select holduino-master/MyoConnect/holduino-src/holduino/holduino.ino
5. Click "Open".

If you have not done so already, you will also need to install the MyoController library, as described in the readme:
https://github.com/hoanghonn/holduino/blob/master/README.md
